paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: The paper discusses a previously uncharacterized base change in the BRCA2 gene, specifically IVS6+14 C > T, but does not provide extensive penetrance data or individual case details.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: A 39 year-old woman with bilateral metachronous breast cancer (at 28 and 37) was referred from the Service of Medical Oncology to the Unit of Genetic Counselling of hereditary cancer of our institution.

functional_data.summary: The change was predicted not to affect splicing based on bioinformatics tools.

variants.additional_notes: The variant is previously uncharacterized and classified as a variant of uncertain significance (VUS).
key_quotes: Only a previously uncharacterized base change in the position IVS6+14 C > T (c.516+14 C > T according to HGVS nomenclature) of BRCA2 gene was found.

extraction_metadata.notes: The extraction was straightforward as the paper provided clear information regarding the BRCA2 variant.
